parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of strings with description of all vehicle's magazines, their ammo count (current/default) and their ids. 

When applied to a unit (soldier), the command behaves differently and will omit magazines already loaded into unit's weapons. Use [[currentMagazineDetail]] to get this information for a currently loaded magazine. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''magazinesDetail''' vehicle </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> [[magazinesDetail]] [vehicle, includeEmpty] &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Since Arma 3 v1.99.146475)</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [vehicle, includeEmpty]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle.  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> includeEmpty (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to include empty magazines. Default: [[false]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value>[[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_magazinesDetail = [[magazinesDetail]] [[player]];
/*
[
	"6.5mm 30Rnd STANAG Mag(30/30)[id:3]",
	"6.5mm 30Rnd STANAG Mag(30/30)[id:9]",
	"9mm 16Rnd Mag(16/16)[id:12]",
	"Smoke Grenade (Green)(1/1)[id:14]",
	"Chemlight (Green)(1/1)[id:16]",
	"RGO Frag Grenade(1/1)[id:18]"
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>*/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_magazinesDetail = [[magazinesDetail]] Mi_48;
/*
[
	"30mm APDS shells(250/250)[id:20]",
	"30mm HE Shells(250/250)[id:21]",
	"Scalpel E2(8/8)[id:22]",
	"Skyfire(38/38)[id:23]"
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>*/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[currentMagazineDetail]], [[magazines]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[magazinesAmmo]], [[magazinesAmmoFull]], [[magazinesDetailUniform]], [[magazinesDetailVest]], [[magazinesDetailBackpack]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
